thread.title: Sherri Sullinger Hoe
thread.title_full: webuyanycar.com reviewed by Sherri Sullinger Hoe

author: Sherri Sullinger Hoe
title: Sherri Sullinger Hoe
text: Donald was great to work with. He explained everything that went into the valuation of our vehicle. He offered us a reasonable, fair amount for our truck, and we were able to leave with a check in less than an hour. None of the hassle, risk or unknowns of trying to sell the vehicle ourselves. If only every auto transaction was this pleasant. I would definitely recommend Donald and We Buy Any Car to my friends.
